name: Extreme Car: Real Driving
description:
Jump off the ramps and perform rolls over the edge of a stunt. Cars are fully modified with NOS feature aswell. Let the adventures of car driving begin. Variety of sports and off road car models with modern modifications are available to bring a havoc in the city. Racing in cars with speed drifting and riding the cars like a professional drift racer. Become top racer in the world of crazy drifters with a chance of flying off your car in air from the stunts and ramps placed throughout the streets.

Features:
- Realistic car stunt physics
- Real looking painted car models
- Amazing graphics
- New cars to select from
- Simple and addictive gameplay
